ovdesc.p: This table is used to define various criteria to determine a product for heavy weight payment. Based on the payment characteristics, a product will be determined and the product is linked to various like Fee, Ledger, Client Condition, Posting and Routing product. This is also linked to various transaction code to be used while booking the payments. This will influence the flow of payment based on the STP indicator, Imposed flag and Message priority.
